Terms and Conditions

Welcome to our website. If you continue to browse and use this website, you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which together with our privacy policy govern Highway Auto Spares’ relationship with you in relation to this website. If you disagree with any part of these terms and conditions, please do not use our website.

1. Terms

By accessing this Website, accessible from https://highwayautosolutions.com, you are agreeing to be bound by these Website Terms and Conditions of Use and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you disagree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from accessing this site. The materials contained in this Website are protected by copyright and trademark law.

2. Use License

Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on Highway Auto Spares’ Website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

  • modify or copy the materials;
  • use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display;
  • attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on Highway Auto Spares’ Website;
  • remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or
  • transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server.

This will let Highway Auto Spares terminate upon violations of any of these restrictions. Upon termination, your viewing right will also be terminated and you should destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether it is printed or electronic format.

3. Disclaimer

All the materials on Highway Auto Spares’ Website are provided "as is". Highway Auto Spares makes no warranties, may it be expressed or implied, therefore negates all other warranties. Furthermore, Highway Auto Spares does not make any representations concerning the accuracy or reliability of the use of the materials on its Website or otherwise relating to such materials or any sites linked to this Website.

4. Limitations

Highway Auto Spares or its suppliers will not be held accountable for any damages that will arise with the use or inability to use the materials on Highway Auto Spares’ Website, even if Highway Auto Spares or an authorized representative of this Website has been notified, orally or written, of the possibility of such damage. Some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties or limitations of liability for incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

5. Revisions and Errata

The materials appearing on Highway Auto Spares’ Website may include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Highway Auto Spares will not promise that any of the materials in this Website are accurate, complete, or current. Highway Auto Spares may change the materials contained on its Website at any time without notice. Highway Auto Spares does not make any commitment to update the materials.

6. Links

Highway Auto Spares has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its Website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The presence of any link does not imply endorsement by Highway Auto Spares of the site. The use of any linked website is at the user’s own risk.

7. Site Terms of Use Modifications

Highway Auto Spares may revise these Terms of Use for its Website at any time without prior notice. By using this Website, you are agreeing to be bound by the current version of these Terms and Conditions of Use.

8. Your Privacy

Please read our Privacy Policy.

9. Governing Law

Any claim related to Highway Auto Spares’ Website shall be governed by the laws of Kenya without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
